attributes.action: Additional  question added  to ballot paper for general elections
attributes.additional_details: add the question  "would you be willing to accept a coalition government if there is no overall election winner".simply answer  yes or no.  never again must we see  the willful abandonment of party manifestos, on the pretence  of  "well dont blame us   were in a coalition"  making  the use of lies and underhanded  tactics  to secure votes even  more likely. we try to promote democracy all around the world, yet  we have a government  that was voted for by no one.PLEASE HELP MAKE SURE THIS NEVER HAPPENS AGAIN...THAN YOU..
